name: Asteroid Blaster (IJplayz)
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE!

BETA 1.1 PATCH NOTES:
BUFFED BRUTES
MOVED HUNTERS TO LEVEL 4
FIXED BUG THAT DELETES 2 HEALTH POINTS VIA BULLET (HOPEFULLY) THIS BUG IS BECAUSE OF HTML 5 FOR SOME REASONMADE THE SHOP OPTIONAL ON THE WIN SCREEN

DESCRIPTION

"Mowing the lawn for space."
- My friend Anthony

I could not have said it better.

WARNING! THIS GAME WILL MAKE YOU RAGE
I didn't intend for this to be a rage game but oh well it is

You shoot asteroids and the enemy ships to get points. Can you beat all four levels?

CONTROLS

UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT - Movement
SPACE - Shoot
ENTER - Ultimate (once you purchase it)

CREDITS

IJplayz / Isaac Junus - Programming
Nessix / John Kulow - Artist
80% of code from this tutorial

Calvin's Shop Music made by me (IJplayz), and other sounds are from the said tutorial.

Heavily inspired by the game "Asteroids".
